record.field: Excellent credit, high degree of enterprise credit, solvency.
Good credit, high degree of enterprise credit, strong solvency and payment capacity.
Credit is better, enterprise credit degree is good, pay off ability and pay ability are ok.
Credit is general, company credit degree is general, have certain risk.
Poor credit, poor corporate credit, poor liquidity and payment capacity, a certain amount of debt repayment risk.
Poor credit, enterprise credit is poor, debt paying ability is weak, still have the ability to repay debt.
Credit is poor, corporate credit is poor, there is a lot of risk, almost no solvency.
Credit is extremely poor, enterprise credit degree is extremely poor, the enterprise already is in deficit condition, do not have solvency.
Without credit, the enterprise does not have credit, the enterprise basically cannot repay debt, approach bankrupt.
